title: Piwi247
author: Piwi247
content: *FREE30 - NO DEPOSIT NEEDED*> Applicable only for customers from France, Germany and Spain.You can use this FREE 30 EUR to bet on our Sports, CASINO and Exchange platform.IF you are from GERMANY, FRANCE AND SPAIN. Please see instructions on how to get 30 EUR:1. Register using this link ; www.piwi247.com2. Message our live chat support and tell them that you are from BITCOINTALK (this is important)3. Our support will send you the terms and conditions to your registered e-mail and you just need reply AGREE to the email (IF you agree to the terms)4. After that, our support will credit you the FREE 30 EUR. You can use it to play to our different platforms.IMPORTANT NOTE :* You need to mention to our customer support that you found the information from BITCOINTALK* This promotion is available for SINGLE REDEMPTION only.Thank you and If you have questions, feel free to comment here.See you!

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: I'm not sure why, but for some reason the webpage just doesn't want to leave here it's like it's stuck or something.Is it me or a general issue?

comments.author: nakisama
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on March 21, 2023, 05:11:34 PMI'm not sure why, but for some reason the webpage just doesn't want to leave here it's like it's stuck or something.Is it me or a general issue?no, you are not the only one

comments.author: worldofcoins
comments.body: Quote from: Piwi247 on March 21, 2023, 02:37:46 PM*FREE30 - NO DEPOSIT NEEDED*> Applicable only for customers from France, Germany and Spain.You can use this FREE 30 EUR to bet on our Sports, CASINO and Exchange platform.Pretty interesting offer for customers from France, Germany & Spain. I would suggest going for its expansion as well as many customers from Asia and the African pacific prefer online casino platforms.Offer such as this benefits new customers trying out the website for the first time.

comments.author: Lahlad
comments.body: I understand that it was a difficult decision, but you handled it well.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on March 21, 2023, 05:11:34 PMI'm not sure why, but for some reason the webpage just doesn't want to leave here it's like it's stuck or something.Is it me or a general issue?This issue is still yet to be attended to as I checked OP profile and OP since was active last on March 22, 2023, 01:01:27 PM which otherwise means this OP is not active on this platform and  the observations from the site as quoted  since then has not been looked into which says otherwise if they really give listening ear to their customers because as a representative, OP is supposed to be active online answering questions and enquiries from possible or potential customers and participants on their platforms but the reverse is the case now.

comments.author: Piwi247
comments.body: Quote from: worldofcoins on March 28, 2023, 02:55:37 PMQuote from: Piwi247 on March 21, 2023, 02:37:46 PM*FREE30 - NO DEPOSIT NEEDED*> Applicable only for customers from France, Germany and Spain.You can use this FREE 30 EUR to bet on our Sports, CASINO and Exchange platform.Pretty interesting offer for customers from France, Germany & Spain. I would suggest going for its expansion as well as many customers from Asia and the African pacific prefer online casino platforms.Offer such as this benefits new customers trying out the website for the first time.Hello Sir,Thank you so much for your suggestion.Will check on it and discuss for consideration.Thank you.

comments.author: Piwi247
comments.body: Quote from: CryptSafe on March 29, 2023, 05:48:26 PMQuote from: Cantsay on March 21, 2023, 05:11:34 PMI'm not sure why, but for some reason the webpage just doesn't want to leave here it's like it's stuck or something.https://i.ibb.co/kJdbLSN/Screenshot-20230321-180926.jpgIs it me or a general issue?This issue is still yet to be attended to as I checked OP profile and OP since was active last on March 22, 2023, 01:01:27 PM which otherwise means this OP is not active on this platform and  the observations from the site as quoted  since then has not been looked into which says otherwise if they really give listening ear to their customers because as a representative, OP is supposed to be active online answering questions and enquiries from possible or potential customers and participants on their platforms but the reverse is the case now.Hello Sir,We are aware of this issue. We are in communication with our game providers and developers to fix this issue as soon as possible.Sorry for the inconvenience cause.Thank you.

comments.author: Hirose UK
comments.body: Quote from: worldofcoins on March 28, 2023, 02:55:37 PMQuote from: Piwi247 on March 21, 2023, 02:37:46 PM*FREE30 - NO DEPOSIT NEEDED*> Applicable only for customers from France, Germany and Spain.You can use this FREE 30 EUR to bet on our Sports, CASINO and Exchange platform.Pretty interesting offer for customers from France, Germany & Spain. I would suggest going for its expansion as well as many customers from Asia and the African pacific prefer online casino platforms.Offer such as this benefits new customers trying out the website for the first time.Piwi247 provides a free bonus of 30EUR without a deposit to only three countries and this bonus is very unfortunate because it is only given to three countries, even though this bonus can make piwi247 get a lot of gamblers and introduce the name of the casino to all gamblers if the bonus is applied to all gamblers without require certain countries.Notification of bonus information like this will have a positive impact in the future because piwi247 was not active on existing forums and threads other than this thread.Piwi has 2 of the same ANN threads. My advice to representatives is to immediately lock the other thread because the forum rules make it clear that each casino may not create more than one ANN thread.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: Hirose UK on March 30, 2023, 02:30:30 PMPiwi has 2 of the same ANN threads. My advice to representatives is to immediately lock the other thread because the forum rules make it clear that each casino may not create more than one ANN thread.He should it seems the representative of Piwi247 is not really serious about promoting their project here, he disregard the forum rules by having two threads which could imperil his account, he is not wearing a copper account which is a must for a representative here with an announcement thread here, especially for casino platforms, the announcement is not well designed it should be the work of a professional designer.But it's good that the representative is active in addressing questions, I hope he'll lock the other thread so he can continue to have the presence of their casino.
